E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 9/8/1982
Subject: Progress of David Hawkin
Dear Sir,
David Hawkin has nothing more to prove at AA Patriot Games!
He has an ERA of 3.26 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 9/22/1982
Subject: Why?
Sir,
so you want to trade me... well, I don't like the idea.
I like playing for your team, Sir. Please
change your mind!

Regards,
Romeo Ramirez
